name: export
title: Export a PlanDefinition
description:
Export a PlanDefinition.
### Export Contents
The export contains the PlanDefinition including referenced resources:
- PlanDefinitions (without information about publisher, contact, author, editor, reviewer and endorser)
- ActivityDefinitions (without information about publisher, contact, author, editor, reviewer and endorser)
- Questionnaires (without information about publisher, contact)
- Libraries
- Organizations
- DocumentReference + QFDD

Each resource is returned in a separate JSon file.
### Parameters
- exclude: references to ActivityDefinitions or PlanDefinitions to exclude from the export.
### Output
Output can be found in Binary.content. This is a Base64 encoded .zip file containing JSon files.
All returned objects are Fhir resources.
